proposal.personalizedPitch:
Your Institute of Export Operations & Management - IEOM. Nigeria website caught my attention - particularly business approach. However, I noticed several development opportunities that could help with growth.

I'm David Ariyo, a Full Stack Developer specializing in real-time applications. I work with companies in international trade & development to solve technical challenges through custom development.

I spotted several areas where custom development could help:

1. Import/export business could benefit from inventory management and tracking systems
2. International trade operations could be streamlined with custom logistics software
3. Custom team communication platform could improve collaboration

Recent relevant projects:
• Dassage - Real-time messaging platform with video calls and file sharing
• Full MERN stack development (MongoDB, Express.js, React, Node.js)
• Cloud deployment and authentication systems

Worth a 15-minute conversation to see if this makes sense?

Best regards,
David Ariyo
Full Stack Developer | MERN Specialist
